entries.description: twice a day at institution-specified times
service is provided continuously between start time and stop time

entries.comment: (e.g., between this meal and the next, between dinner and sleep
This is also the default when this component is null.

entries.description: where xxx is some frequency code
entries.comment: (e.g., PRNQ6H); given as needed over the frequency period.

entries.description: repeats on a particular day of the week,
entries.comment: From the French jour (day). If <integer> is missing, the repeat rate is assumed to be 1. Day numbers are counted from 1=Monday to 7=Sunday. So Q2J2 means every second Tuesday; Q1J6 means every Saturday.

entries.description: in the morning at institution-specified time
every day before the hour of sleep
four times a day at institution-specified times
in the evening at institution-specified time
during each of three eight-hour shifts at institution-specified times
three times a day at institution-specified times
for future use, where <spec> is an interval specification as defined by the UNIX cron specification.
“X” times per day at institution-specified times, where X is a numeral 5 or greater.
entries.comment: (e.g., 5ID=five times per day; 8ID=8 times per day)
